Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by: Rev. Daniel Delgado, Pastor, House Of Victory Church 70,  Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, N.Y. 10301.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Rose.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by: Rev. Daniel Delgado, Pastor, House of Victory Church, 70 Westervelt Avenue, Staten Island, N.Y. 10301.



Council Member Rose moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of October 11, 2012 be adopted as printed by Council Member Van Bramer.
Items.MinutesNote: Council Member Van Bramer moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of October 11, 2012 be adopted as printed.

Items.Title: Messages & Papers from the Mayor

Communication from the Mayor - Resubmitting the name of Nicholas Scoppetta to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the New York City Conflict of Interest Board, pursuant to Section 2602 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Items.MatterName: Nicholas Scoppetta, Conflict of Interest Board

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Disapproval, dated November 19, 2012, of the action of the City Council regarding ULURP No. C120267 PPM (L.U. 721 & Res 1578).

Items.MatterName: Disapproval - Planning, Disposition of two (2) city-owned properties, 22 Reade St and 49-51 Chambers St, Manhattan (C 120267 PPM)

By The Speaker (Council Member Quinn):
Pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226 or §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code, the Council resolves that the action of the Department of Consumer Affairs approving an unenclosed sidewalk café located at  28 8th Avenue, Community Board No. 2, Application no.  20135107 TCM shall be subject to review by the Council.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by Consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Sidewalk café, 28 Eighth Ave, Manhattan (20135107 TCM)

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(e) of the New York City Administrative Code.
